submission.title: Live Submission Interface
submission.description: A real-time environment for solving problems, submitting code, and receiving feedback.

safe.title: Safe Execution
safe.description: Submissions run in isolated environments with time and memory limits.

ai.title: AI Feedback
ai.description: Failed submissions get vague, human-like hints powered by Gemini.

realtime.title: Real-Time Contests
realtime.description: Live scoreboard, problem announcements, and student analytics.

step1.title: Submit Code
step1.description: Students solve problems and submit code directly from the web interface.

step2.title: Isolated Execution
step2.description: Code runs inside a judge container with language-specific scripts and safety checks.

step3.title: Get Results + AI Hints
step3.description: Results are displayed instantly, with optional AI hints for debugging and improvement.

instructors.title: Instructors
instructors.description: Create contests, manage problems, and track student progress.

students.title: Students
students.description: Practice problems, compete in contests, and receive smart feedback.

contests.title: Contests
contests.description: Live scoreboard, time limits, and multilingual problem support.

stack.title: Built with modern tools
stack.description: The architecture combines performance, safety, and developer experience.

Join.error: An error occurred while trying to join the contest. Please try again later.

Leave.error: An error occurred while trying to leave the contest. Please try again later.

AI.title: AI Assistant
AI.description: Get help from our AI to understand why your solution might be failing. The AI will analyze your code against the problem and your solution and provide suggestions.
AI.error: An error occurred while trying to get help from the AI. Please try again later.
AI.noResponse: The AI did not provide a response. Please try again.
